raw_fastq.s0RawData/demo_r1.fq.gz: the path and filename of your r1 fastq file
raw_fastq.s0RawData/demo_r2.fq.gz: the path and filename of your r2 fastq file

barcode.s0RawData/barcode: the path and filename of your barcodes. The barcode file should only contain 2 columns in the order of samplenames and barcodes
